and who does n't love a goat ? ! ? !
output.sentences: Today was the day that the piglets were born.
There were so many of the tiny pink piglets.
They were very cute and small I wanted to keep them all.
Next to the piglets was a larger pig who seems very lazy.
The farm also has goats who love to play with the pigs.
